titleStmt.title: XIV articles of treason and other misdemeanors, exhibited to Isaac Penington, by Master Chamfield, alias Captain Cloak-bag, against Edward Dobson, the malignant stationer without Newgate.
titleStmt.author: Dobson, Edward, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, for Edward Dobson,

notesStmt.note: Satire on Parliamentary party; Hugh Peters & New England "Canaanites" are mentioned.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
